## Loading my package
```{r}
library(RttestPackageProg3)
```

```{r}
set.seed(21)
x <-rnorm(30,5,2)
set.seed(23)
y<- rnorm(30, 3,2)
alpha <- 0.05
```

##creating an object by the constructor function in the package
```{r}
obj <- RttestPackageProg3::new_Rttest(x,y,alpha=alpha)
```

##printing the object by the print function in the package
```{r}
print(obj)
```
